title: 萌新求助 [Crackshot]插件子弹发射不出去
author: 终界龙伯爵
txt_content:
M4A1:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "M4A1"
        Item_Type: 294
        Item_Lore: "&6M4A1????????????"
        Attachments:
            Type: main
            Info: ""
            Toggle_Delay: 
            Sounds_Toggle: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Dual_Wield: false
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 1
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Speed: 20
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: 16-true
        Projectile_Damage: 10
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions:: true
        Remove_Bullet_Drop: true
        Bullet_Spread: 3
        Sounds_Shoot: EXPLODE
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Night_Vision: true
        Zoom_Amount: 4
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 4
        Zoom_Before_Shooting: false
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Abilities:
这些代码不知道哪里错误了qwq求各位大佬教教本菜鸡:3

replies.author: 诺尘_
replies.txt_content: 如果近战模式启用，将不会触发任何弹

replies.author: 终界龙伯爵
replies.txt_content:
诺尘_ 发表于 2017-5-20 13:56
如果近战模式启用，将不会触发任何弹
谢谢大佬

replies.author: 终界龙伯爵
replies.txt_content: 能再麻烦详细说下吗qwq   我又不会了
